Text: That should be enough for now.
We are come to deliver you unto darkness eternal...
There is no escape from death!
In death, you will find salvation!
Let us return, before we are waylaid any further.
If you value your life, flee while you still can!
A moment's hesitation and she will tear you apart!
I can only pray she forgets about me...
I think I can make it back by myself. Thank you.
Put down as many as you can!
Gizamaluks! A whole horde of them!
They must be looking for a place to nest.
We must keep them away from the ruins!
They only gather like this when preparing to nest.
Now there is nothing to stop them from defiling the ruins.
Let us withdraw for now and try to find another way.
Do you think we have seen the last of them?
Come. Let us continue our patrol.
Where are my sisters when I need them?
Why must they take so many!?
We shall need to guard this entrance more carefully from now on.
Thank you, for all you have done.
Is that all of them, I wonder?
Do you have any more of the artifacts?
If you find any more, please give them to me!
The wood raiders still have some of the relics!
They may only be deer, but do not underestimate them!
I wish you would stop worrying!
Would you care to join me on a hunt?
You have been practicing for this moment, have you not?
I will try not to disappoint you.
You worry overmuch. Just remember your training.
Perhaps it was too soon for you.
With a little help from our friend here.
Yes, and I am very thankful.
When next we hunt, you shall face your prey alone.
But what is it doing here?
It must have mistaken us for intruders...
We had best inform the others.
Perhaps we need to replace the core.
Ox'Gatorl, hear our prayer! Stop this madness!
We shall not succumb to the likes of you!
How could I have been so foolish!?
May my aim be straight and true!
You cannot hope to defeat us!
I have nothing left to give...
Your time is close at hand...
The moment I have been waiting for...
When all else is dust, I shall remain.
The earth opens up to claim you, mortal.
I must sssay, it has been much harder to fish of late.
Can I interessst you in some work?
When the clutchmother is happy, all of us are happy.
What a paltry ssselection of pearls!
I need as much coral as I can carry!
No sssuch thing as too much!
Thank you! Now for the next part of the plan.

Do not waver!
Defend the Round!

Your fashion sense
is bad, and you
should feel bad!

All that lives
will someday die!

Your face! It's
breaking my immersion!
I'm taking you in for questioning.
No time to catch our breath...
There shhhould be plenty in this cave!
I hope we do not encounter any...trouble.
Benthos! What are you doing here!?
I will not die so easily!

Not good!
Hold on, I'm coming!
I can sssmell those shhhells from here!
Perhaps thisss was a bad idea?
Hopefully, that was the lassst of them. Many thanksss!

What a waste
of my time...

I don't even
know why I care!

I-I've never been
so scared in
all my life...

To think that
was once a man...

Today's catch
smells a bit...riper
than usual.

Wait, that's not
the stink of fish!

I heard screams!
Are you─
what's that smell?

Draw your weapons!
And try not to breathe!

The smell is gone!
Or my nose has
stopped working!

I'll take either,
at this point.
...Wait, what's that?

\\<pant> Let's leave
before anything
else shows up.

It's too strong!
Grab the fish
and run!
The treasure is mine! All mine!

Must find...the ship...
Forget the crew...

What did I do to
deserve such attention?
Your fight is with me, Andreia!

Massive draco. Right.
Here we go, then!
You can do it, finlesss one!
Perhapsss this was a bad idea!
They may be lurking in the shhhadows!
I am not well-sssuited to all of this violence!
Weakling! You dare shhhow your face!?
You are a fool to challenge usss!
Maybe charging the huge draco was a bad idea...

But I can't
\\<huff> just let it
run amok...

We did it!
I can't thank
you enough!

Hardly palatial,
but could be worse.

In spittin' distance
of the Crystarium, too.
Maybe our prey'll come to us!
But don't think your petty heroism will save you.

You thralls to morality
are pathetic.

Leave Lakeland to
the true sinners.

I think I heard─
There! It's them!

Nightshade!? And so
close to the Crystarium...

These lands are not
yours to claim!

Seems we're rid of
them for the time being.

Pray we don't happen
upon any more.

We're taking too
many losses! Retreat!

Draw your weapons!
We've got company!

Crystarium's got plenty
of fools to playact
the hero, I see.

Always did love
a good farce!

Just know that
you will never
have won.
We are Nightshade and we will not be forgotten!

No time to worry
about it now!

We managed to
drive them off.
Let me take care of that!
There'll be nothing left to bury!

So it's come to this...
No choice but to use Final Bastion!

They have our cousin!
Release the TERROR!
Witness the dawn of a new era!

Fire the forges! Tonight we
build an army!
Brave adventurers, enkindle the flames of the Bombard with your dance!

All that work!
Reduced to rubble!

Did anyone bother
to draft blueprints?
We'll be back! Just you wait!
Of all the times for them to appear!
Right on top of the tracks, too...
No choice but to kill them all. Or have sssomeone else do it...
Thank you! Now to investigate those tracks.
These marks were left by some sort of mouth... A very large one.
These are the remains of itsss prey. This warrants a closer look...
Is there no end to them!?

Alack, the timber
is fighting back!
That is the biggest one I have ever ssseen!
And that is Zumshs Aath Deepdread, the worst of them all!
I do not fancy our chances...
We do not know unlesss we try!
Spirits of my ancessstors, watch over me!
To think that we could triumph over Zumshs Aath Deepdread!
Red fragments of sssome sort... Perhaps the ssstories were true?
I was a fool to even attempt thisss!
Yesss! Another ssstep closer to finding that beassst!
Archaeotania shhhall be mine to command!
Ssspineless weaklings, the lot of you! Retreat!
Oh, I remember now. Thisss is cubus territory...
Thanksss to you, I was able to gather some ussseful clues.
It is a matter of time before I find Archaeotania!

Hm? What breaks
through yonder─ AUGH!

Did you think we'd
just let you go
on your merry way?

Ahem. As I harvested,
lonely as a cloud─

No, let me guess.
You were attacked. Again.

Will you require
an escort back
to the Crystarium?

Ah, chivalry!
The truest art.
Please do.

That's what I get
for being distracted...

I can do no more.
We must flee!

I have not yet
shuffled off this
mortal coil? Huzzah!

We should make
haste lest any
more are about.

Ha! That's right,
run back to your
precious refuge.
Take your “victory.” Just remember, you'll never be safe.

There's nowhere
in this world
you can run.

Lali-ho, lali-ho,♪
It's off to work, I go.♪

Maybe I'll stumble across
some ore on the way home...
It is no good... The Cupsss are doomed...
Look! I brought your favorite coral!
Not when I am ssso close!
I must provide what succor I can...
Ha ha! Thanksss for doing our job for usss!
You think you have me beaten!?
Now go, as fast as you can!
Our allies will see you to safety!
That was easier than I thought!
We shhhall feed you to Archaeotania!
I will not bow to the likes of you!

Hm... I may need
some bigger cogs...

And the actuator will
require additional tuning...

Overall, I'd say this test
was a rousing success!

Ah, I'm bleeding again.
Rather heavily!

\\<sigh> Hang on─
I'll staunch the wound.

And here come
the dracones. Naturally.

Don't mind me.
Just being savaged
by dracones here.
Why does this always happen to me?

We'll be on
our way! Now
where's that knife...

No, no more
touching sharp objects!

Yes, yes! These readings
will prove invaluable!

I am here, foul Goggs!
Tremble before my masterpiece!

Wait... One, two, three, four─
Dastards! Have you no honor!?

Bwahahaha! Says the dwarf
who brought only one doll!
We'll melt her down to scrap!
That's not fair! You had help!

Have you no honor,
cheating Tholl!

You'll pay, interloper!
Don't think you won't pay!

Run, cowards! And next time
bring a bigger army!
Perhaps you would be game for a game, yes?
I call it “Kill or Be Killed!”
The rules are, as you can imagine, rather simple...
Not interested? I can't say I blame you!
I have to say, I'm rather good at this game!
I say, have you played this before?
Well, I think that's enough for one day! Ta-ta for now!
